name: Without roots
description:
The insects are attacking! (or is it the other way around?)
It is your duty to defend the plant commander from the swarms using all your plant comrades.
Remember: insects don't always play fair. So, why would you?

(Made for the 2021.2 Brackeys Game Jam, theme "Let there be chaos")

Controls: Action Keys Mouse Select plant/shovel 1 - 2 - 3 - 4 Left click button Upgrade plant / Right click plant Toggle shooting E Left click button Cancel action Q / Move camera AWSD / arrow keys Edge of the screen Center camera R / Pause P Left click button Known issues:
  • When un-focusing the frame and focusing it again during the 2.08 minutes of the game will cause the loop portion of the OST to begin early,  overlapping with the introduction part.
    • Fixes: use the full screen mode, download the game or just wait for the intro (2.08 minutes) to end
